text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 13 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Dai Greene ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Fadil Bellaabouss ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Milan Kotur ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
